div.head: A Soldier's Victory Of Faith

cit.quote:
"For whatsoever is born of God, overcometh the World;
and this is the victory that overcometh the world, even our
Faith. 1st
John 5-4

dateline.date:
Read at the opening of the 35th Convention of United
Daughters of the Confederacy at Moultrie, Georgia,Oct. 15th1929

div.byline:
By Mrs. Loula Kendall Rogers
Poet Laureate, Georgia Division

lg.l: Aurora gleamed in beauty o'er the hills
And cast a ray of golden charm that thrills
A soldier brave, who wandered neath the dome
Of Mountain's sheltering arm and sun-lit home;
Admiringly he gazed upon the view,
And kneeling there where woodland flowers grew'
He plead for Heavenly guidance on his way,
For he must meet impending battle on that day!
'Twas thus at Valley Forge that Washington
Invoked the mighty "King of Kings," and won!
For never a Warrior in other lands had brought
So great a victory as he in Faith has wrought!
Our vast Republic that extends from sea to sea,
Whose banners wave in triumph o'er the Free;
For Heaven has cast great blessings on our land
Of Peace and Plenty by Divine command.
Years pass - Then o'er the plains of Mexico
Near by the gates of Alamo,
The thundering sound of guns proclaim
That General Lane has won the fame
Of "Marion," in his War time creed,
And Zachary Taylor proved a help in need
While Jefferson Davis in that Mexican War,
Was at Buena Vista a reigning Star!
A proof that undying Faith was there
And our bravest heroes lead by prayer
Not one private home they efface
Nor cruelly burn a record's place
This Law kept General Lee for all the years
For oft he spared in Mercy a widow's tears,
And to all nations his Orders were known,
For his memory in reverence by the world is shown.
Who can forget the brave Stonewall Jackson
Whose Living Faith illumed each action?
And Bishop Polk, near Kennesaw's great height
Who there was visually crowned by immortal Light?
Years later on the same true faith abides
As Pershing, the world-honored leader guides,
While Victory crowns with success anew,
And all nations honor his allegiance true!
Then Hail! All Hail! With thankful voice acclaim
That Victory hath crowned "The Pure in Heart," with fame
Let Earth and Heaven rejoice on land and sea afar

When Faith and Love combined
have won the brightest Star!
